mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STATION (stNum, x_pos, y_pos, name, maxQty, zoonName, addr) VALUES (STATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{x_pos}, #{y_pos}, #{name}, #{maxQty}, #{zoonName}, #{addr} )
INSERT INTO chargingstation (CSTNUM, x_pos, y_pos, name, LEFTQTY, addr) VALUES (CSTATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{x_pos}, #{y_pos}, #{name}, #{LEFTQTY}, #{addr} )
INSERT INTO kickboard (KNUM, name, state ,x_pos, y_pos) VALUES (KICKBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name},'정상', #{x_pos}, #{y_pos})
